fields.content:
About TBAE

TBAE (Team Building Activities & Events) is South Africa’s leading corporate team building provider. Our mission is to inspire, connect, and empower organizations through innovative, professionally-facilitated activities and events.

  • Over 15 years of industry-leading experience
  • Trusted by 500+ top companies
  • Nationwide reach: Johannesburg, Cape Town, Durban & more
  • Tailored solutions for every business need

Let us unlock your team’s potential!

fields.title: TBAE Founded
fields.desc: Our journey begins in Johannesburg, with a mission to transform corporate teams.

fields.title: National Expansion
fields.desc: Expanded to Cape Town, Durban, and Pretoria, offering events countrywide.

fields.title: 1,000th Event Milestone
fields.desc: Celebrated our 1,000th team building event with a major corporate client.

fields.title: Virtual & Hybrid Events
fields.desc: Launched innovative virtual and hybrid team building solutions for a new era.

fields.name: Sibongile Mthembu
fields.bio: Sibongile brings over 10 years’ experience in experiential learning and corporate facilitation. She’s passionate about team growth and innovative leadership.

fields.name: Michael van der Merwe
fields.bio: Michael oversees all event logistics, ensuring each experience is seamless and memorable. He’s a problem-solver and creative planner.

fields.name: Fatima Patel
fields.bio: Fatima is the heart of our client service, committed to understanding your needs and exceeding expectations.

fields.name: James Nkosi
fields.bio: James specializes in outdoor and adventure events, bringing high energy and expert safety standards to every project.
